thread.title: Consistency in quality service
thread.title_full: Consistency in quality service - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ebiye01
title: Consistency in quality service
text: This hotel never fails to deliver a consistent and comfortable service for its guests. I have stayed here several times over the last one year plus and the service is always consistent. Courteous staff, smooth check in, clean rooms, great breakfast buffet, lovely Asia style restaurant with a tasty menu.
